text: Minnesota Governor Tim Walz has announced that he will not be seeking reelection
ending his campaign for a second term in office
This decision was made public on January 6, 2026
and it marks a significant development in the state's political landscape
As the incumbent governor, Walz had been expected to run for reelection
but he has now opted not to pursue another term
The announcement will likely set off a competitive race for the governor's seat in Minnesota
with potential candidates from both parties expected to enter the fray
Governor Walz's decision not to seek reelection will have implications for the state's politics
and policy priorities in the months and years to come
